name: POPPHome
0:
”Alexa, turn off my ceiling light.”
”Alexa, dim my lamps to 50%.”
”Alexa, turn off all devices.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
This Skill allows you to control your Smart Home with POPP Home. Connect your POPP Home with the Alexa voice control. Afterwards you can easily control your lights, scenes or heating via speech commands. 

To set this Skill up please follow the instructions in you POPP Home.
